text: [Music]
step five in the seven steps to fluency
in the gatal English method is to
connect new words with other old words
that you already know so if you know a
word that sounds similar or perhaps as a
synonym either in English or in your
native language you can connect them in
your mind you can connect your new word
with a feeling or maybe a smell or a
sound it could be anything really but
the important thing is to connect that
new word with something you're already
familiar with and comfortable with also
the step five is important to connect
not only the idea of the word with
something you already know but to
connect the new word with a situation
that you might use it in connect the new
word with other words to make afraid
that you can imagine using in a an
everyday
situation so step five is to connect in
various ways
